document_data.name: High Hallowed Festival Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Hallowed Festival Hall''' was a temple and hall dedicated to the worship of [[Lliira]] in [[Yhaunn]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Joybringer [[Endress Halatar]] was the High Mistress of Revels for the temple. She was served by 22 other priestesses. Together they attended a congregation of 49 worshipers of Lliira.
